author: Simon Carswell
title: Covid-19 testing: Irish pharma firms source raw material to make reagent
description: Shortages of chemicals used in virus testing have left countries scrambling for materials
content:
Firms within the Irish pharmaceutical industry have sourced a raw material from Europe that can be used to produce scarce chemical reagents that has delayed coronavirus testing.
Global shortages in supplies of reagents used by labs to test swab samples taken… [+2274 chars]
